KPK Akan Ajukan Kasasi, Tim Pengacara Sofyan Basir Mengaku Siap
05 Nov 2019, 08:01 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


KPK Akan Ajukan Kasasi, Tim Pengacara Sofyan Basir Mengaku Siap

KBRN, Jakarta : Tim Pengacara Sofyan Basir, Heru Widodo mengaku yakin kasasi yang akan diajukan oleh Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) akan ditolak."Kita tinggal menunggu apakah penuntut umum akan mengajukan kasasi terhadap putusan itu. Kami yakin kasasinya akan ditolak," jelasnya kepada RRI, Selasa (5/11/2019).Ia juga mengatakan bahwa pengajuan kasasi nantinya tidak akan lagi berbicara soal fakta melainkan akan lebih membahas penerapan hukum."Sebenarnya menurut hukum acara pidana terhadap putusan bebas tidak ada upaya hukum, hukum acaranya begitu, tetapi prakteknya ada beberapa perkara yang diajukan kasasi dan di kasasi diperiksa oleh MA. Kami siap, karena materinya di kasasi soal penerapan hukum bukan lagi soal fakta," imbuhnya."Sementara kami melihat pertimbangan hukum dari majelis hakim pengadilan tipikor Jakarta itu sudah sesuai dan satu pemikiran dengan pembelaan yang kami sampaikan bahwa pembantuan itu syaratanya adalah ada kesengajaan dari pelaku pembantu, kemudian terjadi sebelum dan atau pada saat pidana pokok berlangsung," sambungnya.Sebelumnya, KPK mempertimbangkan mengajukan kasasi pasca putusan bebas Sofyan oleh Majelis Hakim pada Pengadilan Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor) Jakarta, Senin."Dalam konteks kali ini, selain mempelajari lebih lanjut kemudian Jaksa Penuntut Umum (JPU) memberikan rekomendasi kepada pimpinan, alternatif lamgkah-langkah upaya hukum yang bisa dilakukan selain dari proses itu, tentu ada kasasi," ucap Juru Bicara KPK Febri Diansyah di gedung KPK, Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).Diketahui, Sofyan divonis bebas dari semua dakwaan jaksa penuntut umum KPK dalam perkara dugaan pembantuan kesepakatan proyek Pembangkit Listrik Tenaga Uap Mulut Tambang Riau-1 (PLTU MT Riau-1).

KPK Will Submit Cassation, Sofyan Basir's Lawyers Team is Ready
05 Nov 2019, 08:01 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


KPK Will Submit Cassation, Sofyan Basir's Lawyers Team is Ready

KBRN, Jakarta: Sofyan Basir's Attorney Team, Heru Widodo said he was confident that the cassation that would be submitted by the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) would be rejected. "We are just waiting for whether the public prosecutor will file an appeal against the verdict. We are sure the appeal will be rejected," he explained to RRI, Tuesday (11/5/2019). He also said that the filing of the cassation would no longer talk about facts but would rather discuss the application of the law. "Actually according to the criminal procedure law for a free verdict there is no legal remedy, the law is so, but In practice there are several cases which were appealed and appealed by the Supreme Court. We are ready, because the material is appealed to the application of the law, no longer a matter of fact, "he added." While we see the legal considerations of the Jakarta Corruption Court judges are appropriate and one thought with the defense that we submit that the assistance is a condition that there is intentional action from the supporting actors, then there is seb "Before and, when the main crime took place," he continued. Previously, the KPK considered submitting an appeal after Sofyan's acquittal by the Panel of Judges at the Jakarta Corruption Court on Monday. "In this context, in addition to further learning then the Prosecutor The General (JPU) provides recommendations to the leadership, alternative legal remedies that can be taken apart from the process, of course there is an appeal, "said KPK Spokesman Febri Diansyah at the KPK building, Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019). Sofyan was acquitted of all charges of the KPK prosecutor in the alleged case of assisting an agreement on the Riau Mine-1 Steam Mouth Power Plant project (PLTU MT Riau-1).
